title: Super Rugby summaries
text: summaries Reuters Staff 2   summaries   Tries: Collins (21), Ioane (44), Tuipulotu (50), Perofeta (52), Ioane (74), Moala (79) Conversions: Perofeta (22,45,51,52), Gatland (75) Yellow cards: Trainor (64) Sharks (26) 63 Tries: Botha (10), du Preez (33), Mtembu (56), du Preez (59), Van Wyk (71), Bosch (83) Conversions: du Preez (10,33,57,60,71,85) Penalties: du Preez (3,15,25,38,63,69,77) Yellow cards: Nkosi (43) Referee: Nick Briant Brumbies (11) 17 Tries: Taliauli (25) Penalties: Hawera (9,19,48,70) Waratahs (13) 24 Tries: Naiyaravoro (40,42) Conversions: Foley (42) Penalties: Foley (4,24,64,76) Referee: Paul Williams Sunday,
